mapper.select: select count(1) as value, date(createtime) as label, DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()),DATE(createtime)) as sequence from video where orgid = #{orgid} and status='1' group by date(createtime) having sequence < 30 order by label

select count(1) as value, date(createtime) as label, DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()),DATE(createtime)) as sequence from image where orgid = #{orgid} and status='1' group by date(createtime) having sequence < 30 order by label

select sum(dfh.size) as value, date(dfh.createtime) as label, DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()),DATE(dfh.createtime)) as sequence from devicefilehis dfh, device d where d.orgid = #{orgid} and dfh.deviceid=d.deviceid group by date(dfh.createtime) having sequence < 30 order by label
